data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus brutia (Brutia pine) from sample PLAT-11

Exposition S, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Anstehender Serpentin, av. Tree height 9 m, Tree cover 15%, Shrub cover 60%, Herb cover 2%, Vegatation type: Trock. flachg. aufgel. Fö-Stao. Windexpon. , Film number: 632A
